title: Web developer
description: Self-taught of {{age}} years, I have been passionate about web development, UI/UX and accessibility for {{sinceDate}} years.

projects.title: Case studies of personal projects
projects.subtitle: Here is a selection of my personal projects, if you click on one of them you can read a case study about it.

descriptions.Tempus: A simple yet featureful pomodoro in the tray/menubar
descriptions.Ribbon: A bookmark manager app with reminders and pinned bookmarks
descriptions.Export GitHub Stars: View / Sort / Export your starred repositories.
descriptions.Gelbooru Client: A material client to explore an image board.

about.title: About Me
about.description:
I am passionate about front-end development and web design, user experience and accessibility I develop Human-centered projects.

I'm also passionate about open-source, I am a contributor to several projects and I'm also passionate about teaching (talks, articles, mentoring).

descriptions.Hacktoberfest 2018: The Hacktoberfest 2018 was the first edition in which I participated. I contributed to 10 projects including Streaker a software that tracks your daily contributions on GitHub.
descriptions.Hacktoberfest 2019: For this second edition I contributed to 4 projects including the Node.js site where I added a feature to display a random contributor in the footer.
descriptions.GitHub Game Off: The GitHub Game Off contest consists in creating a video game in 1 month. I decided to participate 1 week before it closes and I was able to discover the beginnings of the development of a video game.
descriptions.Climate Fixathon: The Climate Fixathon is a hackaton that encourages the creation of innovative projects to reduce global warming. We have created a team consisting of a designer and two developers. The project was an application to build better habits and share them in a social network way. https://purposehabits.com/
descriptions.GitHub Education #PinsToWin: The #PinsToWin contest organized by GitHub Education consists of decorating your profile with Gists. I made a gist that displayed my last activity on Twitter and another one for GitHub.
descriptions.#100DaysOfCode: The #100DaysOfCode movement consists in developing a minimum of 1 hour a day in order to learn and share one's learning on the networks. I did this movement 2 times.

form.defaultMessage: Or, if you prefer a form :
form.message: What do you want to say ?
form.error: There's been an error, feel free to try again later.
